Recommended Books Read in 2016

Full List

January

  • Present! A Techie’s Guide to Public Speaking, by Karen Catlin and Poornima Vijayashanker
  • The Inner Game of Music by Barry Green and W. Timothy Gallwey

February

  • Shark’s Fin and Sichuan Pepper: A Sweet-Sour Memoir of Eating in China by Fuchsia Dunlop
  • Ajax Penumbra: 1969 by Robin Sloan
  • Debt: The First 5000 Years by David Graeber
  • Filmish: A Graphic Journey Through Film by Edward Ross

March

  • The Passionate Programmer by Chad Fowler
  • Just Kids by Patti Smith
  • Visualization Design and Analysis by Tamara Munzner

April

  • The Design of Everyday Things by David A. Norman
  • Sprint: How to Solve Big Problems and Test New Ideas in Just Five Days by by Jake Knapp, John Zeratsky and Braden Kowitz
  • Enchantment: The Life of Audrey Hepburn by Donald Spoto

May

  • Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil: A Savannah Story by John Berendt
  • On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft by Stephen King

June

  • The Gutsy Girl: Escapades for Your Life of Epic Adventure
  • Reclaiming Conversation: The Power of Talk in a Digital Age

July

  • Black Hole Blues and Other Songs from Outer Space

August

  • Smarter Faster Better

September

  • American Chinatown
  • Magic and Loss
  • Things I Have Learned In My Life So Far
  • Sharpie Art Techniques
  • Ego is the Enemy

October

  • Slide:ology
  • 101 Things I Learned In Fashion School

December

  • Neverwhere (Dec)
